name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions, adept in key technologies such as **AWS**, **GCP**, **Python**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **NoSQL**, **Vue.js**, **Django**, **MongoDB**, **DynamoDB**, **CircleCI**, **GitHub Actions**, **Kubernetes**, and **Celery**. Proven expertise in designing and implementing **event-driven architectures** and deploying cloud-native applications that leverage real-time analytics and automation. Demonstrated proficiency in CI/CD pipelines, utilizing tools like **EventBridge** and **DataDog** for observability and test automation. Competent in Agile methodologies and collaboration within cross-functional teams to ensure compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
Additionally, brings rich experience in integrating AI/ML solutions and managing MLOps workflows using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Passionate about building secure, maintainable systems that effectively drive real-world impact.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and developed robust, scalable software solutions leveraging **Python** and **JavaScript** across healthcare and finance sectors while ensuring adherence to regulatory standards including HIPAA and GDPR.
• Engaged in cross-functional collaboration within **Agile** environments, driving the delivery of high-quality applications and enhancing team productivity through tools like **GitHub Actions** and **CircleCI**.
• Spearheaded the transformation of monolithic architectures into scalable microservices ecosystems using **Kubernetes**, enabling continuous integration and deployment for improved software delivery.
• Constructed and maintained cloud-based data architectures using **MongoDB** and other **NoSQL** databases to ensure seamless data flow and real-time analytics, particularly for high-volume healthcare and financial data applications.
• Implemented **Event-Driven Architecture** for responsive, real-time applications, thus enhancing user interaction and operational efficiency.
• Developed user-friendly front-end applications using **React** and **Vue.js**, ensuring a seamless user experience across both web and mobile platforms.
• Established comprehensive test automation strategies utilizing tools such as **PyTest** and **Cypress**, ensuring high code quality and reliability across all services.
• Devised and deployed advanced data visualization solutions using libraries like **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling stakeholders to derive actionable insights from complex datasets.
• Led the integration of machine learning models into applications using **Python** frameworks including TensorFlow and PyTorch, facilitating enhanced decision-making through predictive analytics.
• Collaborated with data science teams to embed NLP capabilities utilizing **spaCy** and **Hugging Face Transformers** within healthcare applications, directly improving anomaly detection and document processing accuracy.
• Integrated observability tools like **DataDog** for enhanced monitoring of application performance and reliability, ensuring operational excellence across all deployed services.

Utilized **AWS** and **GCP** to deploy scalable application architectures, ensuring high availability and performance for financial systems.
Leveraged **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and **JavaScript** (Node.js, **Vue.js**) to create robust backend services within a microservices framework, enhancing system agility and collaboration for cross-functional teams.
Employed **NoSQL** databases such as **MongoDB** and **DynamoDB** to optimize data storage solutions for dynamic financial applications, improving overall application response times by **30%**.
Designed and implemented an **Event-Driven Architecture** using **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** to facilitate real-time data processing, achieving a **25%** increase in transaction handling efficiency.
Developed responsive front-end applications with **TypeScript**, applying **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** for enhanced user experiences on financial dashboards with load times reduced to under **2 seconds**.
Created observable systems using **DataDog** for performance monitoring and root cause analysis, improving system reliability and uptime by **40%**.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with **CircleCI** and **GitHub Actions**, accelerating deployment cycles by **50%** and ensuring quality through automated test frameworks.
Championed collaboration in an **Agile** environment, fostering teamwork to deliver complex projects on schedule, while maintaining high development standards and promoting best practices in software engineering.

Utilized **AWS** and **GCP** for cloud infrastructure management, ensuring high availability and scalability in all backend services.
Developed and optimized backend services for a global e-commerce platform using **Python** (Django) and **JavaScript** (**Node.js**, **Express**) to maintain low latency across **9** key modules such as checkout and order fulfillment.
Engineered real-time features leveraging **Event-Driven Architecture** with **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** to provide responsive updates and improve customer satisfaction.
Designed dynamic frontend applications using **Vue.js** (version **3**) and implemented **TypeScript**, ensuring fast and responsive user experiences for both web and mobile platforms.
Employed **MongoDB** and **DynamoDB** for NoSQL data management, achieving a fault-tolerant data access strategy for high-traffic e-commerce operations with **95%** uptime.
Integrated AI/ML recommendation engines using **scikit-learn** and **TensorFlow**, leading to a **20%** increase in product conversion rates through personalized recommendations.
Implemented **Redis** caching strategies for critical services such as shopping cart sessions, enhancing application responsiveness by reducing database read pressure.
Adopted feature flags and blue-green deployments using **Kubernetes** and **GitHub Actions**, facilitating controlled rollouts and effective A/B testing during platform updates.
Created responsive e-commerce user interfaces using **Next.js** and **HTML5/CSS3**, optimized for mobile engagement and compliant with **WCAG 2.1** standards.
Built secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe** and **PayPal**, upholding PCI compliance and protecting sensitive data through tokenized transactions.
Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** for secure user authentication, ensuring GDPR compliance throughout the platform while enhancing collaboration in an **Agile** environment.
